languages.text: {n}Крыса радостно пищит и принимается перекатывать цветные шарики, выбранные игроками, по запутанным туннелям внутри игрового поля. Но ни один из них не достигает цели — лузы, помеченной красной краской. Зверек то и дело скатывает шарики за пределы поля или же загоняет их в тупики. Когда одни охотники за легкой наживой уходят ни с чем, их место сразу же занимают новые.{/n}

{n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls the players have chosen around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat just rolls all the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Крыса радостно пищит и принимается перекатывать цветные шарики, выбранные игроками, по запутанным туннелям внутри игрового поля. Но ни один из них не достигает цели — лузы, помеченной красной краской. Зверек то и дело скатывает шарики за пределы поля или же загоняет их в тупики. Когда одни охотники за легкой наживой уходят ни с чем, их место сразу же занимают новые.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls that have been picked by the players around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat keeps rolling the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players gets their hopes of an easy score dashed and leaves empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

{n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls that have been picked by the players around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat keeps rolling the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players gets their hopes of an easy score dashed and leaves empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

{n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls the players have chosen around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat just rolls all the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avec un couinement d'excitation, le rat commence à faire rouler les billes colorées choisies par les différents joueurs dans le labyrinthe de tunnels, mais aucune bille n'atteint le trou marqué d'un cercle rouge. Au lieu de cela, elles finissent soit hors du plateau, soit dans un cul-de-sac. Ses espoirs déçus, le premier groupe de joueurs repart les mains vides tandis que d'autres ouvriers viennent immédiatement prendre leur place.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls the players have chosen around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat just rolls all the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un couinement d'excitation, le rat commence à faire rouler les billes colorées choisies par les différents joueurs dans le labyrinthe de tunnels, mais aucune bille n'atteint le trou marqué d'un cercle rouge. Au lieu de cela, elles finissent soit hors du plateau, soit dans un cul-de-sac. Ses espoirs déçus, le premier groupe de joueurs repart les mains vides tandis que d'autres ouvriers viennent immédiatement prendre leur place.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La rata emite chillidos de entusiasmo y hace rodar las bolas de colores escogidas por los jugadores por el laberinto de túneles que surca el tablero. Pero ni una sola de ellas alcanza su objetivo, un orificio marcado con un círculo rojo. La rata se limita a empujar las bolas hasta callejones sin salida. Cuando el primer grupo de jugadores se marcha con las manos vacías y las esperanzas frustradas, otros trabajadores ocupan inmediatamente su lugar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls the players have chosen around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat just rolls all the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La rata emite chillidos de entusiasmo y hace rodar las bolas de colores escogidas por los jugadores por el laberinto de túneles que surca el tablero. Pero ni una sola de ellas alcanza su objetivo, un orificio marcado con un círculo rojo. La rata se limita a empujar las bolas hasta callejones sin salida. Cuando el primer grupo de jugadores se marcha con las manos vacías y las esperanzas frustradas, otros trabajadores ocupan inmediatamente su lugar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ネズミは興奮気味に鳴いて、挑戦者が選んだ色付きボールを遊戯盤の上の迷路のようなトンネルで転がし始める。しかし、ゴールの赤い丸の穴にボールが落ちることはない。ネズミはすべてのボールを遊戯盤の外や行き止まりに転がしてしまうのだ。最初のグループの挑戦者が希望を打ち砕かれて手ぶらで帰ると、すぐに新しい労働者がその場所に座った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls the players have chosen around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat just rolls all the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ネズミは興奮気味に鳴いて、挑戦者が選んだ色付きボールを遊戯盤の上の迷路のようなトンネルで転がし始める。しかし、ゴールの赤い丸の穴にボールが落ちることはない。ネズミはすべてのボールを遊戯盤の外や行き止まりに転がしてしまうのだ。最初のグループの挑戦者が希望を打ち砕かれて手ぶらで帰ると、すぐに新しい労働者がその場所に座った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}老鼠兴奋地吱吱叫着，推起了玩家们选中的玻璃球，在迷宫里穿行起来。只要老鼠把玻璃球推到画着红圈的洞里，玩家就赢了，但却没有任何一枚玻璃球被推到洞里。那只老鼠要么把所有玻璃球都推出了游戏板，要么把它们推到了死角。第一组玩家希望破灭，空手而归，后面的工人迫不及待地取代了他们的位置。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls the players have chosen around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat just rolls all the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老鼠兴奋地吱吱叫着，推起了玩家们选中的玻璃球，在迷宫里穿行起来。只要老鼠把玻璃球推到画着红圈的洞里，玩家就赢了，但却没有任何一枚玻璃球被推到洞里。那只老鼠要么把所有玻璃球都推出了游戏板，要么把它们推到了死角。第一组玩家希望破灭，空手而归，后面的工人迫不及待地取代了他们的位置。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Ratte quiekt aufgeregt und rollt die bunten Kugeln, die die Spieler ausgesucht haben, in dem Labyrinth auf dem Brett herum. Aber keine einzige erreicht das Ziel – ein Loch, das mit einem roten Kreis markiert ist. Die Ratte schiebt die Kugeln entweder ganz vom Brett oder in Sackgassen. Sobald die erste Gruppe von Spielern desillusioniert mit leeren Händen von dannen zieht, nehmen umgehend neue Arbeiter ihren Platz ein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls the players have chosen around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat just rolls all the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sıçan, heyecanla ciyaklayıp oyuncuların seçtiği renkli topları tahtanın üzerindeki labirent tünellerinde yuvarlamaya başlıyor. Ancak tek bir tanesi bile kırmızı bir daireyle işaretlenen gol deliğine ulaşamıyor. Sıçan, topları ya tahtanın dışına ya da çıkmaz bir noktaya yuvarlıyor. İlk oyuncu grubunun umutlarını yitirip elleri boş dönmeleriyle birlikte yerlerini anında yeni işçiler alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rat squeaks excitedly and starts rolling the colourful balls the players have chosen around the maze of tunnels on the board. But not a single one reaches the goal — a hole marked with a red circle. The rat just rolls all the balls off the board or into dead ends. Once the first group of players get their hopes dashed and leave empty-handed, new workers immediately take their place.{/n}
